components.component:
org.richfaces.DialogButton javax.faces.command Dialog Button org.richfaces.component.UIDialogButton org.richfaces.component.html.DialogButton
org.richfaces.DialogButton dialog-button.xhtml
dialogButton org.richfaces.taglib.DialogButtonTag org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.UIComponentTagBase
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.AjaxComponentHandler
value java.lang.Object Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.
dir java.lang.String Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left).
lang java.lang.String Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
title java.lang.String Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.
style java.lang.String CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.
styleClass java.lang.String Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) to be applied when this element is rendered. This value must be passed through as the "class" attribute on generated markup.
onblur java.lang.String Javascript code executed when this element loses focus.
ondblclick java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is double clicked over this element.
onfocus java.lang.String Javascript code executed when this element receives focus.
onmousedown java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is pressed down over this element.
onmouseup java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is released over this element.
onmouseover java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved onto this element.
onmousemove java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved within this element.
onmouseout java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a pointer button is moved away from this element.
onkeypress java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is pressed and released over this element.
onkeydown java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is pressed down over this element.
onkeyup java.lang.String Javascript code executed when a key is released over this element.
accesskey java.lang.String Access key that, when pressed, transfers focus to this element.
tabindex java.lang.String Position of this element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be an integer between 0 and 32767.
mode java.lang.String Sets mode of requests to 'ajax' or 'server'. "ajax"
&ui_command_attributes;
